attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that each individual has the right to express themselves in a manner that is lawful and in keeping with their natural, God-given rights, such as Freedom of Expression - and the Freedom to take photographs in public places.

rejection.details: The title of your petition needs to be a call-to-action, not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
